Key: ...What is love?
L-Love? Hmmmm... Love, huh?

(It's such an abstract question out of the blue.
How should I answer?)

(Normally Kotori or Reine-san would give me a
command here, but... they're not giving me
anything.)

(Come to think of it, is it this hard for me to
communicate in the real world? Well, it's not like
I'm talking to a Spirit right now, but...)
Hmm... Love... What is love...?

...What kind of thing is love? I don't know.
So I want to know.
Uhh, hm... Why do you want to know so much?
I wonder why...?
Um, don't ask me...

But I want to know... That's what I think. That's
all I want to know in this world—just love.
I-I see...

(The only thing in this world... That's
real intense. Who is this girl?)

What is love...? What does it point to?
I need to know.

Or else, I won't be complete. I won't be able to
fulfill my role. So... I want to know love.

That sounds pretty serious...
Love, hm... love...
Shido Itsuka, do you not know what love is?

Well, I know what the word means. But it's hard to
explain. And how do you know my name...?
I know everything in this world.
(Everything... Hm? Wait...)
Oh, are you like a navigation NPC or something?

(Then it would make sense that I wouldn't have
recognized her. But it's a mystery that Reine-san
didn't know about it, either...)
Navigation... Is that... my role?
Hm? You don't know?

I wasn't given a role... All I know is one thing.
That I need to know what love is... That is all.

Hmm... Then what about your name? What's your
name?
Name... My name... is...
(She's deep in thought.)
...Arusu. My name matches outside data.

Nice to meet you, Arusu. That sounds really
unique. Is that your last name? Or your first
name?

I... do not know. I just know that I am Arusu...
The data tells me so.
I see. Then I'll call you Arusu.

Okay, it's nice to meet you. So, Shido Itsuka...
Please teach me what love is.
So, we've come back to that topic.

(Do I have to answer this? I'm not getting any
instructions from Kotori or Reine-san...)
Kotori, Reine-san... Can you hear me?
(...They're not answering.)
Can you tell me what you think love is?

Hm... Well... Love is finding someone precious or
dear to you...

So if you find them precious, is it love? Then do
you love the flower that you water every day?

W-Well, that's... different... Kind of. Well
actually, I guess it is different.

So if you find them precious, is it love? Then,
Shido Itsuka... Do you love money? You're
always trying to save money every month.
How do you know that?!

A-Anyways... Money is important... but I guess I
don't love it...

(When she asks me stuff like this, it makes me
lose my confidence.)
Even if you find it precious, you don't love it.

It seems to be contradicting what you stated
earlier, Shido Itsuka.
Well... that's true, but...

There are so many different forms of love. I mean,
there's romance, there's love for your neighbors,
familial love. Family...

You want to protect that person. Or you would do
anything for that person... That type of feeling,
I guess?
...You were saying many things just now.
Y-Yeah. I was, but...

(When I thought of family, I thought of Kotori.
But if my little sister heard me say I'd do
anything for her, God knows what she'd ask of me.)

Then if you had a leash put on you, and someone
asked if they could step on you, would you comply
with them out of love?

Where did that come from?! N-No, I mean, it's not
like I'm judging that kind of love, but...?!

(She's right. I was just thinking about what I
would do for Kotori, but for some reason I
suddenly remembered Kannazuki-san just now...)

You won't judge... Then, being stepped on...
is also love.
No, no, wait a minute.
Waiting is also love, then?

Uh, it's not like that. And why did you bring up
being stepped on...

When you mentioned family, it was a result of what
I predicted, based on Kotori Itsuka's actions.

Right... I see. Well, um... I apologize as her
brother.
Huh...?

If you claim they are both wrong... What is love
for you, Shido Itsuka?
Hmm....

For example, if you think of them, your heart
feels happy or full of joy...

(I kind of thought about Tohka
as I answered that.)
Heart becomes happy or full of joy...

Then... If your dinner is curry, Tohka Yatogami
becomes happy and starts to hum. Does that mean
she loves curry?

I wouldn't be surprised if she did! But... I guess
you could say that about her and all different
kinds of food.
So is it different from love?
I wonder... It's true that the term love" can be

...But when used with a person, it just feels
different.
So, loving a human is different?

Yeah. Food, sports, hobbies... Loving these things
is a bit different.

I see. Then I... want to know what love is toward
humans.
Uh... Why is that?

Of all the information of love that I have
recorded, that is the only uncertain thing.
That is why I want you to teach me what love is.

Yeah, I had a feeling you'd say that... Hm...
Maybe it's the feeling of having compassion
for someone...

Compassion and love... Do they mean the same
thing?
Oof... O-Oh. Well... I guess... uh...

Gosh, I'm so sorry, Arusu. I guess I don't know
how to explain it.
...Putting "love" into words is hard.

If that is the case... Then we shall simulate the
growth of this form of love... That way, I may
find an answer.
Huh? What do you mean by that?

I need appropriate materials to formulate love
with Shido Itsuka. Initializing search...
(Search...? What does she mean by that...?)
Search complete. Making contact now.
